title: Moving from out of state?   Call a Free Apartment Finder!(Licensed!)
neighborhood: Rental Friends Lodo, Highlands, Rino, Ballpark,
posting_body: Hey there, Jeff here - broker/owner of Rental Fiends - apartment location service.
Over the past 15 years I have helped TONS of folks find great places to live.
I have buildings downtown and nearby with nice 1 beds starting in the 1700's - -
I know the market and I know all of the buildings in Denver.
Give me a ring and I can help you find a great place to live.
There is absolutely no fee to you to use my service - give me a call!
I have apartments all over the downtown area from Rino, to Uptown to Cherry Creek to City Park, Ballpark to Belmar.
